name: outside the box
notes:
i'm delighted to present "outside the box"

winter is over here in the northern hemisphere, and the hard ground is giving way to green shoots and already some flowers. thinking outside the box and pushing outside your comfort zone is where the magic happens, so while nature gets on with its annual magic display, please enjoy this square created especially for the [bamcal group][1].

you will see links within the pattern to pages online for stitches you may not be familiar with. 

for one of the special stitches, i have made a ("wobbly") video which you can watch here: https://youtu.be/tcem8ek06lk 

if worked in aran/worsted it should come in at around 12 inches square. i have used dk yarn, which makes a smaller square.

if you have any questions, feel free to drop me a message here on ravelry.


  [1]: https://www.ravelry.com/groups/2025-crochet-block-a-month-cal
